DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore mechanism behind sleep quality may affect skin aging , skin integrity skin disease .
DOC.criteria: Males female age 18 year Capable give informed consent Adults either healthy , normal volunteer skin disease include limited eczema , psoriasis , acne inflammatory dermatosis Fitzpatrick Skin Type IVI In good general health Willing cooperate study instruction Volunteers 18 year young Any serious medical physical condition would cause subject significant discomfort study procedure Women pregnant , nursing , may become pregnant next 3 month
